terms_and_privacy_accepted.description: Must be `true` to indicate that terms and privacy are accepted. Partner need to store this information in the user order.

order_has_been_paid.description: Must be `true` to indicate that the order has been paid. Partner received payment from user.

email.description: The partner user email. Must contain the **user's real email**. By default, any emails from our side are disabled.
The partner user email. Must contain the **user's real email**. By default, any emails from our side are disabled.

user_name.description:
Not required. 

 **Exception** 
 `Moldova` all vignettes **required** this data .

passport_number.description:
Not required. 

 **Exception** 
 `Moldova` all vignettes **required** this data .

cars.description: Array of Vehicles with vehicle plate and registration country.

country.description:
Vehicle registration country code. Use **two lowercase**(!) letter code format like `at`, `cz`, `pl`, `ua`... 

 [More about country codes. IMPORTANT to read](/docs/routes/countries)

plate.description:
Carplate number (vehicle plate)

 **Important!** 
 Only numbers and Latin characters 

 **Exception** 
 `German` and `Austrian` license plates where the car number 
 must contain **one dash** `-` sign. 

 [More about car plate templates](/docs/routes/patterns)

vin_code.description:
Not required. 

 **Exception** 
 `Romanian` `10`, `30`,`90` and `365` days vignettes **required** this data .

products.description: Array of vignettes with custom id, name, period, and start date.

name.description:
Country of vignette. 

 To check options - use endpoint [/public/products -> name](/docs/routes#products-list-endpoints)

start_date.description: Start date of vignette in `UNIX` time in **Europe/Berlin Timezone**

period.description:
Period of vignette. Available periods depend on the country. 
 Possible options `7`, `10`, `30`, `60`, `90`, `180`, `365` days. 

 For tunnels you can use `1j`, `2j` and `365`, where `j` mean **journey** 

 To check options - use endpoint [/public/products -> price](/docs/routes#products-list-endpoints) 

 [More about country periods](/docs/routes/vignette-covered-countries)
